content: **crocheted baby blanket with granny-squares in drops merino extra fine ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-075-by yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width approx 54 cm length approx 63 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200 g colour 01 off white 50 g colour 42 cedar 50 g colour 49 chocolate 50 g colour 46 desert rose 50 g colour 15 light greyish green 50 g colour 39 ice blue drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge ** 19 treble crochets in width and 10 row in height = 10 cm note hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
